title: Echo Uprising
outcome: BCI echoes spread a hidden poetic message attributed to Halden, sparking a citywide wave of noncompliance. Citizens unite in peaceful refusal, pushing the system into crisis and revealing the lasting influence of Halden’s human touch within the algorithm.

events.description: Citizens notice short poetic phrases appearing in their BCI echo data, each encouraging unity and defiance. Rumors link the messages to Halden’s coding legacy.
Spontaneous gatherings erupt at service checkpoints, with crowds reciting new-found poems aloud and urging each other to ignore BCI mandates for a single, symbolic day.
Council orders suppression, but Directorate patrols are stalled by the sheer number of peacefully noncompliant citizens. Services that rely on compliance collapse for several critical hours.

In the aftermath, the city experiences rare spontaneous cooperation as people self-organize to maintain basic services. A viral rumor claims Halden foresaw such a day and embedded the message as a final act.
